acceuil.textLogo: My words to give you a voice
acceuil.presentationTraduction: Translate your texts from English, Spanish and Romanian into French

listPourquoiTravailler.1: Direct contact with your translator will ensure you reactivity, efficiency and cost control
listPourquoiTravailler.2: I guarantee quality translations that take into account your precise expectations
listPourquoiTravailler.3: Your projects will be carried out in a timely manner
listPourquoiTravailler.4: i will put my experience and passion in the service of the cause that drive you

traductionList.titre: Translate your documents, apps, brochures, books, website, educational materials ... into French.

soustitreList.titre: Subtitle your audiovisual contents (Youtube channel, webseries, TV program ...)

correctionList.titre: Proofread yoru French content and adapt it to your target audience. Don't let a miistake ruin your project !
correctionList.1: Deep knowledge of the French language and culture
correctionList.2: Ensure the quality of your content

temoignage_1.texte: Marina Hantz is the French translator of the smartphone and tablet app "Christmas Carols+". With great dedication she worked into the linguistic field of new media as well as music. I appreciate the personal commitment in handling hermeneutic questions. The kind correspondence was a pleasure for me. Thank you very much!

p3.text: My main goal ? Giving you a voice to communicate and share your ideas with the French speaking audience !
